thread.title: House panel hears retailers' concerns about chip-and-signature cards
thread.title_full: House panel hears retailers' concerns about chip-and-signature cards

title: House panel hears retailers' concerns about chip-and-signature cards
text:
22 House panel hears retailers' concerns about chip-and-signature cards 
Computerworld: Three representatives of small businesses said at a U.S. House hearing Wednesday that new chip-embedded credit cards need to have added PIN security instead of the chip and signature favored by most banks and card companies.
